column4: my pc restarted and now I am unable to boot windows or linux. It just says Grub and tells me to press Tab
first you are going to have to open the bios and put the sdb hd before the others for this to work. To be honest for me it is 3:13 am I need to crash, so others may be able to help.
this is any easy fix If I was there about 5 min work, but on the web with a new user this could take awhile, I need to sleep.
